document.full_text: novak djokovic has been invincible so far this year but his assault on rafa nadal's world number one ranking could be about to hit the skids.
document.title: soaring djokovic now ready to challenge nadal on clay
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic has been invincible so far this year but his assault on rafa nadal's world number one ranking could be about to hit the skids.
